text:
- [Narrator] The business
world has evolved
beyond the corporate office,

and working remotely has
become the new normal.
The Amazon WorkSpaces family
supports this emerging work style,

providing a set of fully
managed infrastructure services
that takes care of capacity planning

so you can provision
virtual desktops in minutes
and scale on demand using AWS regions
to put resources closer
to your end users anywhere in the world.
The WorkSpaces family offers
the reliability your employees expect,

along with the security
your organization needs.

Amazon WorkSpaces gives you
an all-inclusive VDI solution,
including management software,

making it simple to deploy
and manage virtual desktops.

Amazon WorkSpaces Core
provides a set of APIs
that let you access the same reliable
and secure WorkSpaces infrastructure

through a supported third
party VDI management software,
making cloud migration easier.
Amazon WorkSpaces Web equips your users

with isolated browser access
for web-based workloads,
making data security a cinch.
Protect your data

and help your remote teams
maximize productivity
with the Amazon WorkSpaces family.
